message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique item that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a little high for my budget.  Would you consider $9,000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $9,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice.  While I see the value, I'm aiming to keep my acquisition costs lower.  Could we settle at $10,000?
